mutants.code:
def increment_by_1(n):
    mask = 2
    while n & mask:
        n ^= mask
        mask <<= 1
    n ^= mask
    return n

def increment_by_1(n):
    mask = 0
    while n & mask:
        n ^= mask
        mask <<= 1
    n ^= mask
    return n

    mask = 1
